text: Jeanette Anna MacDonald (June 18, 1903 â€“ January 14, 1965) was an American singer and actress. She was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. She was known for her roles with Maurice Chevalier in The Love Parade, Love Me Tonight, The Merry Widow and One Hour With You. She also starred with Nelson Eddy in Naughty Marietta, Rose-Marie, and Maytime. MacDonald was married to actor Gene Raymond from 1937 until her death. However, despite being married to Raymond, she was in a domestic partnership with actor Nelson Eddy at the same time. MacDonald died on January 14, 1965 in Houston, Texas of heart failure, aged 61. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1903 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:Singers from Philadelphia
title: Jeanette MacDonald
